name: Ground Kontrol Classic Arcade
description: Amazing arcade. Must visit. Machines are in top shape. Games use tap-to-scan gamecards. Price per play is incredibly reasonable. Roughly 60-90 cents in points per play. Half off weekdays noon to 5pm

machine_conditions.comment: It's now working, knock on wood.
Yeah, this machine has a lot of issues, many bugs to work out still.
Almost ready

mre - mellow out, this isn't a whitewashing comment. When GZ is set with the bubble in the middle, it is generally very floaty. Almost all Godzillas are set steeper than what the bubble suggests (bad bubble design?). The tech stated below that they use their own level for this machine. If it's too steep for your liking, ok, but maybe take it offline?

Operator is white washing comments, which is against pinball maps guidelines.

Just played a Godzilla Premium in Milwaukee's Blackbird Bar that is level and plays like butter.

"Tournament standard..." 😂
Our machines are set up to a tournament standard.

This machine, like all games I played there last night, was so far angled down on the front legs that playable was greatly affected. Hitting the left and right ramps was very difficult due to the extreme angle on the playfield, as verified by the built in level and experience playing at least 8 other Godzilla machines.
It's level, we use a much better level to check and make sure.
Bubble level suggested angle of playfield was slightly out of alignment.
Mint.
They're normal LED flashers in normal flasher domes, the same parts we use on all our Bally/Williams machines.
The strobe lights in the back are so blindingly bright… my eyes!
Since been fixed. I played it last Saturday and it was fine.
Tilts if you breathe too hard to the point of being unplayable. So annoying!!!!!! This is my favorite game of all time and I couldn’t even enjoy playing it. 💩🤬🖕
Fixed
Two ball multiball?
Fixed.
Center ramp target is sticking up intermittently when you hit it and the tilt is tight enough that you can easily tilt out trying to free it.
Switch replaced.
Left loop doesn't seem to be registering correctly
Chair opto fixed, now working!
Electric chair opto not working, only hits to the stand up target register
Right flipper sticking.
Small room over by the kitchen
Sorry, moved it today and it must not have gotten checked. Tilt adjusted.
Tilt is... excessively tight.
Pop bumper repaired.
The bottom pop bumper wasn’t popping.
Plays great.
Small room over by kitchen
Fixed, back on
Turned off.
Flipper buttons cleaned and playing well!
Left flipper button sticky - otherwise playing just fine
Playing fine
Launch is broken. Can’t even make it up into the violets upon launch
This machine has been moved to the highlight spot next to the bar at the time of this post.
Small room over by kitchen
Drac is repaired.
Drac is currently disabled, hit the drac targets during drac attack to score hits
Dracula toy not moving
Pop bumper repaired, tested, working again.
Bottom pop bumper is not popping.
Flippers adjusted, playing well
Right flipper feels a little floppy.￼
Playing great
Frankenstein ramp doesnt start multiball.
Plays great. Only complaint is that there's a light directly above the machine so you can't tell which monsters you have lit,
Frank targets fixed
Frank stand up targets are down so no frank multiball
No issues, table is flying.
The bride's loop is at an improper angle- the ball can get stuck up there
Fixed, back on.
Turned off.
Now working
Right flipper button is sticking a lot
Shield is fucked up
The shield drops itself or doesn’t open all the way when it should be open. The volume is set way too lol and the tilt way too high.
Left saucer repaired, working again.
Left saucer hinky
Loose wire, machine back up and running.
Out of order
Plays great.
Playfield light issues fixed, now working normally
FORCE target, lightsaber duel, endor, and super jackpot playfield lights not functioning (waiting on parts)
Playfield lights are not functioning properly, tattooine scoop goes STDM, but ball save is not on.
Ramp replaced, machine back on.
Now working
Upper flipper sticks up until the ball knocks it down
Flipper repaired.
Thing flipper not working
Chair light fixed.
Left sling fixed.
Flashers are the same flashers on all of our machines, none are brighter than the others.
Right light knocked off the chair
Left sling firing randomly
Looks and plays great! The only critique I have is the flashers are blindingly bright… it would be easier to see if dimmer LEDs were swapped in 😬
The DMD is repaired.
DMD is fucked up
Flipper repaired.
Thing flipper not working
Issues fixed, working
Missing gates on plunge and riot shot, shoot again light flickering, right flipper button is sticky
Full plunges often get caught exiting the plunge lane and never make it up to the skillshot lane.
Plays great.
Plays great.
Goes into ball search after ball drains.
Upper left flipper doesn’t work.
Thanks for letting us know!  The issues have been taken care of.
Top flipper is getting stuck in the flipped position. Also doesn't seem to acknowledge the power ball in play.
We installed a brand new powerball today!  -GK

We finally got the clock back up and running!
Thanks!
-GK

Home use only since 1993. As close to new as you can get! -GK, 8/14/11

Machine does play great, but Powerball is so dirty it looks like a normal ball. Clock is broken as well.
Tilt adjusted.
Tilt is... unreasonable.

Far left outlane rubber replaced, stuck ball issue fixed. We've been in communication with Stern about the plunger/autolaunch issue. Unfortunately it's problem with many Uncanny X-Men machines from the factory caused by the ball clattering in the orbit after launch. Stern is working on a fix and as soon as we get it we will install it.
Ball gets stuck in far left outlane. Plunger & start button don't have enough power to get the ball over the hump around 50% of the time. Really takes away from the game play
Machine fixed, no more missing ball.
Not stuck anymore but there could still be a missing ball
Stuck without a ball
Fixed today.
Left flipper sticking
Both flippers usually stay up when flipped
Beautiful. Plays great.
best Pro in town
Orb shot temporarily repaired, part ordered, when it arrives it will be properly repaired.

Orb shot doesn't register. 
You can get the drop target down, but you can't lock balls.
Found issue and fixed it, Trough should be good now.
Trough issues are getting worse - will often fail to kick out balls successfully and this will cause issues with ball saves - game ends up losing track of how many balls it puts back into play.
Groot shot repaired.

Groot’s mouth doesn’t want to close between lock shots. On a new ball, modes often get selected automatically and the timer begins before the ball gets plunged. And the last ball I played, the auto plunger (button) didn’t activate it.
Fixed.
Appears to be the orb drop target
Sometimes its firing a switch at start of ball/game which will auto select mode and start timer
Machine repaired and back on.
Out of order 6/11/2023
Groot shot fixed
Groot very rarely registers a shot
Groot’s mouth won’t open
Pop bumpers don’t seem to be firing, not sure if it’s only the bottom one or all of them having issues. Otherwise seems to work well
Great
Fixed.

If a ball is in the lock, sometimes it will kick out two when kicking out after hitting the 
the scoops
Switch fixed.
Is the spinner not registering or do I just not understand how Super Spinner mode works?
Both fixed
Upper pf sling kicker outside sling, plunger is hinky
One of the grid insert LEDs is out, it might be time to reseat the connectors or crimp new ones. Otherwise plays great!
Switch tested, fixed, now working.
The right outlane rollover wasn’t registering.
So fast, so good!
Plays great.
It’s turned on and SO FAST. I love this game
Game was out of order when I visited on 08/08/22
Previous auto-launching issue fixed
Co-op mode not starting when Start button held down; always auto-launching every ball making skill shot nearly impossible.
Snappy flipps!
Fixed, back on
Turned off.
Lil Deadpool head missing, but playing normally

Ball save light is almost invisible. Little Deadpool multiball is starting early: if you knock down the left 2 targets and then bounce the ball into the lil Deadpool zone, then it gets stuck behind the right target, but starts multiball immediately without putting the targets up and needing to hit them again. Happened two games in a row.
Don’t even try to nudge this machine.
Plunger fixed.
Plunger still can't hit skill shot
Back up and working!
Stuck balls fixed.
Two balls stuck in ramp (upper right corner)
Flippers recently rebuilt, very strong
Fixed a while ago, hasn't rev tested since.
Rev tested while playing
Safe repaired and working.
The safe is totally hosed and barely registers, so what’s the point?
The drop target does NOT send the ball flying back over the slingshot into the outlane. This is the only one in town like this.
A new color DMD was installed.
Extra balls are currently enabled. DMD is unreliable: sometimes the top few rows of pixels are dark, screen went completely blank on starting the Executive Game mode
Perfect machine, but extra Balls turned off. Awards 10M instead.
